toolCalls.name: list_directory
toolCalls.description: Lists the names of files and subdirectories directly within a specified directory path. Can optionally ignore entries matching provided glob patterns.

thoughts.subject: Considering Project Structure
thoughts.description: I've started by listing the files in the current directory. This gives me a better lay of the land, allowing me to start the creation of a Python AI agent that can execute Python code with a solid understanding of the project's structure.
